replies.author: q513902026
replies.txt_content: 没有获取插件的实例  用以使用getConfig()方法

replies.author: 131的说法是
寂
replies.txt_content:
131的说法是 发表于 2016-3-26 09:16
那到底应该怎么改呢大神extends JavaPlugin
你需要继承JavaPlugin类

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content: 下载一个反编译, 随便下载个插件读源码就能解决...

replies.author: coderzeng
replies.txt_content: 告诉你个最简单的。。。Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("名字");,懒得话就用这个吧
